Official EU AI Act Documents

Authoritative Resources

This page provides direct links to official European Union resources related to the Artificial Intelligence Act. These documents represent the authoritative sources for understanding and implementing the regulatory requirements.

Primary Legislation

Core Legal Texts

EU AI Act - Final Text

The complete legislative text of the EU Artificial Intelligence Act as adopted.

Access document Published: March 2024

Official Journal Publication

The AI Act as published in the Official Journal of the European Union.

Access document Published: Q2 2024

European Commission Guidance

Implementation Support

Implementation Roadmap

Official timeline and milestones for the phased implementation of the EU AI Act.

Coming Q3 2024

AI Risk Classification Guidelines

Detailed guidance on determining AI system risk categories.

Coming Q3 2024

Compliance Handbook for Businesses

Comprehensive guide to compliance requirements and procedures.

Coming Q4 2024

Technical Standards

Harmonized Standards

The European Commission has requested the development of harmonized standards to support implementation of the AI Act. These standards are being developed by European standardization organizations.

Standardization Request

Commission's formal request to European standardization organizations for AI Act standards.

Coming Q3 2024

Technical Standards Roadmap

Timeline and work program for development of harmonized standards.

Coming Q4 2024

Governance Documents

Oversight Frameworks

AI Office Establishment

Framework and responsibilities of the EU AI Office.

Coming Q2 2025

AI Board Procedures

Operational procedures and decision-making processes of the AI Board.

Coming Q2 2025

GPAI Model Requirements

General Purpose AI Model Provisions

GPAI Technical Documentation Guidelines

Requirements for technical documentation of general purpose AI models.

Coming Q1 2025

High-Impact GPAI Model Assessment

Methodology for determining and assessing high-impact general purpose AI models.

Coming Q1 2025

Supporting Materials

Additional Resources

Central hub for EU AI policy information, including the AI Act.

European Commission AI Act FAQ

Frequently asked questions about the EU AI Act.

European Parliament's overview and briefings on the AI Act.

Document Updates

Stay Informed

This document collection is regularly updated as new official resources become available. Last updated: June 2025.

For the most current information, we recommend also checking the European Commission's official communications channels.

Disclaimer: While we strive to maintain accurate and up-to-date links to official documents, the authoritative sources are the European Union institutions themselves. If you discover any broken links or have suggestions for additional resources to include, please contact us.
